meanings.definition: A group of seven things or people.
meanings.sent1: The heptads of colorful balloons floated in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The heptads of students formed a line outside the classroom.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the heptads of clowns made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The heptads of stars twinkled brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: Count the heptads of apples on the tree to see how many are ripe.

meanings.definition: A series of seven related elements or units.
meanings.sent1: The heptads of musical notes created a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent2: The heptads of colors in the rainbow are stunning.
meanings.sent3: In the story, the heptads of magical stones held great power.
meanings.sent4: The heptads of chapters in the book kept the readers engaged.
meanings.sent5: The heptads of days in a week pass by quickly.
